## `UseJavaScriptCookies`

Toggles whether the web harvester parses JavaScript\index{web harvester!managing cookies} for cookies needed by the website.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
UseJavaScriptCookies(boolean useJSCookies)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` useJSCookies | `true` to use cookies parsed from JavaScript when connecting to webpages. |
